def init_params(layer):

    dx = ( layer.fs['W'][0], layer.fs['X'][0] )

    layer.fs['W'] = dx

    layer.p['W'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['W'])
    layer.p['b'] = np.zeros( layer.fs['b'] )

    layer.init = False

    return None

Recurrent¶

RNN¶

class nnlibs.rnn.models.RNN(hidden_size, runData, binary=False, activate_input=<function tanh>, activate_output=<function softmax>, initialization=<function orthogonal>)[source]¶

Description for class

Variables

  • var1 – initial value: par1

  • var2 – initial value: par2

nnlibs.rnn.forward.rnn_forward(layer, A)[source]¶
nnlibs.rnn.backward.rnn_backward(layer, dA)[source]¶
def init_params(layer):

    # W, U, b - _ gate
    layer.p['U'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['U'])
    layer.p['V'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['V'])
    layer.p['bh'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bh'])

    # W, U, b - _ gate
    layer.p['W'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['W'])
    layer.p['bo'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bo'])

    # Set init to False
    layer.init = False

    return None

GRU¶

class nnlibs.gru.models.GRU(hidden_size, runData, binary=False, activate_update=<function sigmoid>, activate_reset=<function sigmoid>, activate_input=<function tanh>, activate_output=<function softmax>, initialization=<function xavier>)[source]¶

Description for class

Variables

  • var1 – initial value: par1

  • var2 – initial value: par2

nnlibs.gru.forward.gru_forward(layer, A)[source]¶
nnlibs.gru.backward.gru_backward(layer, dA)[source]¶
def init_params(layer):

    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wz'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wz'])
    layer.p['Uz'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Uz'])
    layer.p['bz'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bz'])
    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wr'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wr'])
    layer.p['Ur'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Ur'])
    layer.p['br'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['br'])
    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wh'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wh'])
    layer.p['Uh'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Uh'])
    layer.p['bh'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bh'])
    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wy'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wy'])
    layer.p['by'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['by'])

    # Set init to False
    layer.init = False

    return None

LSTM¶

class nnlibs.lstm.models.LSTM(hidden_size, runData, binary=False, activate_forget=<function sigmoid>, activate_input=<function sigmoid>, activate_candidate=<function tanh>, activate_output=<function sigmoid>, activate_hidden=<function tanh>, activate_logits=<function softmax>, initialization=<function xavier>)[source]¶

Description for class

Variables

  • var1 – initial value: par1

  • var2 – initial value: par2

nnlibs.lstm.forward.lstm_forward(layer, A)[source]¶
nnlibs.lstm.backward.lstm_backward(layer, dA)[source]¶
def init_params(layer):

    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wf'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wf'])
    layer.p['bf'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bf'])
    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wi'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wi'])
    layer.p['bi'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bi'])
    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wg'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wg'])
    layer.p['bg'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bg'])
    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wv'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wv'])
    layer.p['bv'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bv'])
    # Init W, b - Forget gate
    layer.p['Wo'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['Wo'])
    layer.p['bo'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['bo'])

    # Set init to False
    layer.init = False

    return None

    layer.p['W'] = layer.initialization(layer.fs['W'])
    layer.p['b'] = np.zeros(layer.fs['b'])

    layer.init = False
